This R markdown reads in data file and package into a R data object and save it.


```{r load, echo=TRUE}
count_data=read.table("data/demo_raw_counts.tsv", 
                      header=TRUE, row.names='Gene')

save(count_data, file="RNASeqData.Rdata")
```
